tier.item: imtisapa tu aji tu tats a
Imtisangba that rice.beer that bamboo.cup one
`Imt isangba squeezed so me rice beer into a cup, drank, propped the shield and
the spear against the fireplace shelf, the shield also, honed the machete and
held [it] drinking the rice beer [as] he sat and waited.'
